name: ProtoTactics
description:
Four courageous heroines embark on a quest to vanquish evil across the land. It's up to you to lead them to victory!

Note: This is a very early prototype. Many, many more features are in store, including:

  • Magic attacks
  • Experience points and leveling up
  • An exploration mode outside of combat
  • An inventory system

Instructions:

To win, you must defeat all the enemies on the field. You will lose if all of your units are defeated.

During player mode:

Select your unit using the left mouse button. 

Selected units will show grey squares (places they can move) and red squares (enemies they can attack). Either move or attack by clicking the square with the right mouse button.

To finish your turn, press "R" on your keyboard.

During enemy mode:

Each enemy will take turns moving and attacking your party.
